name: ❤aaS Community
description: This is a draft project explaining ❤aaS community. The community is something that we need to have in order to discuss and take actions on developing the whole LOVEaaS Network. Please click on the link to join discussion. Thank you!

needs.description: Need to create an official ❤aaS community
